title: NEON GUTTER
subtitle: Every legend starts in the gutter.

objective.desc: Win 10 big blinds from your starting stack.

teachTheme: Basics: fold equity and value betting
reiIntro: Welcome to the Neon Gutter — where every grinder starts. The regulars here are loose and sloppy. Focus on finding strong hands and betting for value. Your goal: build your stack by 10 big blinds.
reiBossNote: PROXY is the boss here. He calls everything — use that against him by betting bigger with your strong hands.

title: CHROME HEAVEN
subtitle: Patience is the price of admission.
reiIntro: Chrome Heaven — a quieter room where tight players wait for the nuts. You need patience here, but also aggression in the right spots. Survive 30 hands without losing your stack.
reiBossNote: MIRROR only plays premium hands. When he enters a pot, respect it. But steal his blinds relentlessly — he'll fold almost anything.

title: VOID RUNNER
subtitle: In the void, only the fearless survive.
teachTheme: Reading bluffs and exploiting aggressive players
reiIntro: Welcome to Void Runner — home of the maniacs. VECTOR will pressure you relentlessly with bets and raises. Your mission: call him down and win 3 pots against him specifically.
reiBossNote: VECTOR bets with almost anything. Don't fold medium-strength hands against him. He bluffs on the river more than 60% of the time.

title: GLITCH PALACE
subtitle: Only one player leaves the palace standing.
reiIntro: Glitch Palace runs a freezeout tournament. No rebuys, no mercy. When a player busts, they're gone. Be the last one standing.
reiBossNote: CIPHER is disciplined and calculating. He picks his spots carefully and maximizes value. Avoid marginal confrontations — wait for clear edges.

title: DATA STREAM
subtitle: The final test. Prove you've learned.

objective.desc: Have the most chips after 60 hands.

teachTheme: Full GTO play and dynamic adaptation
reiIntro: Data Stream — the final arena. NEXUS plays near-perfect strategy. Every opponent here is strong. You have 60 hands to accumulate the most chips at the table.
reiBossNote: NEXUS plays balanced, GTO-adjacent poker. You can't exploit him with simple patterns. Mix your strategies and stay unpredictable.
